required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of SHR20004（Noiiglutide ） on Body Weight in Obese Subjects Without Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled，Parallel-group Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Noiiglutide Injection in Obese Subjects Without Diabetes.

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to assess the efficacy and safety of SHR20004 on body weight in obese subjects without diabetes.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Parallel Assign to SHR20004 or placebo

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in body weight
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in body weight in kilograms

secondary_outcome.measure: Relative change from baseline in body weight(%)
secondary_outcome.description: Relative change from baseline in body weight(%)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with body weight reduction greater than or equal to 5% and10% from baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects with body weight reduction greater than or equal to 5% and10% from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fasting plasma glucose
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in fasting plasma glucose in mmol/L

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fasting insulin
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in fasting insulin in μU/ml

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fasting C-peptide
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in fasting C-peptide in ng/ml

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fasting blood lipids
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in fasting blood lipids including TC\TG\H-DLC\L-DLC in mmol/L

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in glycosylated hemoglobin
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in glycosylated hemoglobin(%)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in blood pressure
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in blood pressure in mmHg

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in waist circumference
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in waist circumference in cm

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in waist-to-hip ratio
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline waist-to-hip ratio（waist and hip will be combined to report waist-to-hip ratio)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in BMI
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in BMI (weight and height will be combined to report BMI in kg/m^2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in plasma glucose of 120 minutes after oral glucose tolerance test （OGTT）
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in plasma glucose of 120 minutes after OGTT in mmol/L

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in insulin of 120 minutes after oral glucose tolerance test （OGTT）
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in insulin of 120 minutes after OGTT in μU/ml

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in C-peptide of 120 minutes after oral glucose tolerance test （OGTT）
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in C-peptide of 120 minutes after OGTT in ng/ml

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in AUC0-2h of plasma glucose during OGTT
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in AUC0-2h of plasma glucose during OGTT in mmol*hr/L

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in AUC0-2h of insulin during OGTT
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in AUC0-2h of insulin during OGTT in μU*hr/ml

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in AUC0-2h of C peptide during OGTT
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in AUC0-2h of C peptide during OGTT in ng*hr/ml

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects developing anti-drug antibody of SHR20004
Percentage of subjects with an Adverse events
Percentage of subjects with Injection site reactions
12-lead ECG
secondary_outcome.description: 12-lead ECG in heart rate（beats）, PR interval（ms）, QT interval(ms), QTC interval(ms), and overall conclusion description

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration of SHR20004 in plasma at steady state

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Informed consent obtained prior to any trial-related activities
2. Body mass index (BMI) between 28 and 40 kg/m2(both inclusive)
3. Diet and exercise management for at least 3 months before screening and less than 5% change in body weight during the previous 3 months（self-reported）.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. History of endocrine disease or treatment that may significantly affect body weight prior to screening visit
2. History of diabetes
3. Personal or family history of medullary thyroid carcinoma or multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2 (MEN2)
4. History of pancreatitis
5. Previous surgical treatment of obesity
6. Screening calcitonin of 20 ng/L or above
